body:
to have learned from our tv box that "lunette" is the french word for 3d glasses, maybe because of the half-moon shape of the lenses

breeze through a window screen

the movers were kind and fast

i almost finished unpacking the kitchen, and found ways to maximize the smaller space

foods which can be described with the word "unctuous"

chorizo

the process of deflating the air mattress since our real bed is here

_three women_, which is a very sad book with an interesting form

having sealed the holes near the bottom of the back yard fence with bricks and feeling comfortable leaving miso out in the yard unsupervised

the configuration of our new living room

that we found the aux cord for d's car, even though i had kind of started to enjoy only being able to listen to z100

drinking wine out of an actual wine glass
